message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be of great value to you. My asking price is $11,000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $10,250? It's still a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find the product worth every penny.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.
